QuestData.Title: B'naar Console Transcription
QuestData.Description: You try to transcribe the shapes as you see them flash across your eyes. The results are less than exact, but should serve as adequate evidence to prove or disprove the Aldor's suspicions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the B'naar Console Transcription to Anchorite Karja at Area 52 in Netherstorm.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let us see what you've brought to us, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $N. Allow me a few moments to go over your transcription.$B$BYou have the priesthood's thanks, $C.
